name: The String
description:
The String is a SAAS / CPAAS Platform that automates marketing and sales processes and communicates with audiences to enhance their experience by making it simple, personalized, customizable, and easy to use.

The String Platform is a string of stages and actions powered by AI that will work together. It will grow the business through increased conversions and customer acquisition by identifying customer behavior and providing 360-degree views of leads and customers.
